div.div: at River Forest, IL | Concordia Stadium

tr.td: CUC wins the toss, will receive, going N to S.
Bornschlegl, S. kickoff 65 yards to the CUC00, touchback.
Granquist pass complete to Lofton for 75 yards to the WLC00, TOUCHDOWN, clock 14:48.
